1.name: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
1.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

2.name: Batman: The Movie
2.description: The Dynamic Duo faces four supervillains who plan to hold the world for ransom with the help of a secret invention that instantly dehydrates people.

3.name: Blowup
3.description: A mod London photographer finds something very suspicious in the shots he has taken of a mysterious beauty in a desolate park.

4.name: The Witches
4.description: Following a horrifying experience with the occult in Africa, a schoolteacher moves to a small English village, only to discover that black magic resides there as well.

5.name: Persona
5.description: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

6.name: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
6.description: A bitter, aging couple, with the help of alcohol, use a young couple to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other.

7.name: Andrei Rublev
7.description: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

8.name: Fahrenheit 451
8.description: In an oppressive future, a fireman whose duty is to destroy all books begins to question his task.

9.name: Nevada Smith
9.description: A half American Indian and half white teenager evolves into a hardened killer as he tracks down his parents' murderers.

10.name: Circus of Fear
10.description: A circus becomes the location for stolen loot and murder.

11.name: Furankenshutain no kaijû: Sanda tai Gaira
11.description: An experimental lab animal called a gargantua escapes from his captors and is suspected to be the creature that is killing people all over the countryside. But when the gargantua from the ...                See full summary »

12.name: Voyna i mir
12.description: Eight-hour epic based on the book of the same name by Leo Tolstoy. Two main story-lines are complex and intertwined. One is the love story of young Countess Natasha Rostova and Count Pierre...                See full summary »

13.name: One Million Years B.C.
13.description: Prehistoric man Tumak is banished from his savage tribe and meets pretty Loana who belongs to a gentler coastal tribe but he must fight caveman Payto to win her favors.

14.name: The Professionals
14.description: An arrogant Texas millionaire hires four adventurers to rescue his kidnapped wife from a notorious Mexican bandit.

15.name: La battaglia di Algeri
15.description: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

16.name: Django
16.description: A coffin-dragging gunslinger and a half-breed prostitute become embroiled in a bitter feud between a Klan of Southern racists and a band of Mexican Revolutionaries.

17.name: Funeral in Berlin
17.description: A British Agent is sent to East Berlin to receive a Communist defector, but the true situation turns out to be rather more complicated.

18.name: Fantastic Voyage
18.description: A scientist is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his blood stream with a small crew. Problems arise almost as soon as they enter the bloodstream.

19.name: The Texican
19.description: A former Texas sheriff, living in Mexico, goes to Arizona to investigate the murky circumstances under which his brother, a peaceful newspaperman, was killed.

20.name: Manos: The Hands of Fate
20.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

21.name: Seconds
21.description: An unhappy middle-aged banker agrees to a procedure that will fake his death and give him a completely new look and identity - one that comes with its own price.

22.name: Torn Curtain
22.description: An American scientist publicly defects to East Germany as part of a cloak and dagger mission to find the solution for a formula resin before planning an escape back to the West.

23.name: The Chase
23.description: The escape of Bubber Reeves from prison affects the inhabitants of a small Southern town.

24.name: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum
24.description: A wily slave must unite a virgin courtesan and his young smitten master to earn his freedom.

25.name: A Man for All Seasons
25.description: The story of Sir Thomas More, who stood up to King Henry VIII when the King rejected the Roman Catholic Church to obtain a divorce and remarry.

26.name: Un homme et une femme
26.description: A widow and a widower find their relationship developing into love, but their past tragedies prove hard to overcome, causing them to proceed with utmost delicacy.

27.name: Dracula: Prince of Darkness
27.description: Dracula is resurrected, preying on four unsuspecting visitors to his castle.

28.name: Cul-de-sac
28.description: In search of help, two wounded gangsters on the run find refuge in the secluded castle of a feeble man and his wife; however, under the point of a gun, nothing is what it seems.

29.name: The Ghost and Mr. Chicken
29.description: Luther Heggs aspires to be a reporter for his small town newspaper, the Rachel Courier Express. He gets his big break when the editor asks him to spend the night at the Simmons mansion that...                See full summary »

30.name: The Silencers
30.description: Retired agent Matt Helm is re-activated in order to stop an evil organization from exploding an atom bomb over the USA and starting WWIII.

31.name: The Sand Pebbles
31.description: In 1926, a U.S. Naval engineer gets assigned to a gunboat on a rescue mission in war-torn China.

32.name: Frankie and Johnny
32.description: A riverboat singer with a weakness for gambling wants to find his lucky red head, but his girlfriend Frankie is not amused.

33.name: Texas Across the River
33.description: In 1845 Texas, a Louisiana belle is courted by a wanted Spanish nobleman and a Texas brawling gunrunner but her suitors' passionate duel is interrupted by the cavalry and a Comanche attack.

34.name: Penelope
34.description: Comedy about a flighty, bored, kleptomaniac wife of a banker who robs her husband's bank of sixty thousand dollars.

35.name: Alfie
35.description: An unrepentant ladies' man gradually begins to understand the consequences of his lifestyle.

36.name: How to Steal a Million
36.description: Romantic comedy about a woman who must steal a statue from a Paris museum to help conceal her father's art forgeries, and the man who helps her.

37.name: Grand Prix
37.description: American Grand Prix driver Pete Aron is fired by his Jordan-BRM racing team after a crash at Monaco that injures his British teammate, Scott Stoddard.

38.name: Au hasard Balthazar
38.description: The story of a mistreated donkey and the people around him. A study on saintliness and a sister piece to Bresson's Mouchette.

39.name: Sky West and Crooked
39.description: A young, lonely, emotionally challenged teenage girl finds solace in burying dead animals after the sudden traumatic death of a childhood friend 10 years earlier.

40.name: Incubus
40.description: On a strange island inhabited by demons and spirits, a man battles the forces of evil.

41.name: The Blue Max
41.description: A young pilot in the German air force of 1918, disliked as lower-class and unchivalrous, tries ambitiously to earn the medal offered for 20 kills.

42.name: Sedmikrásky
42.description: Two girls try to understand the meaning of the world and their life.

43.name: Navajo Joe
43.description: A Native American warrior called Navajo Joe seeks revenge on a gang of sadistic outlaws who has massacred the people of his tribe.

44.name: The Trouble with Angels
44.description: Two high-spirited young students at St. Francis Academy For Girls keep things hopping for the challenged Mother Superior and her staff of bewildered Sisters.

45.name: The Shooting
45.description: A mysterious woman persuades two cowboys to help her in a revenge scheme.

46.name: Masculin féminin
46.description: A romance between young Parisians, shown through a series of vignettes.

47.name: Harper
47.description: Lew Harper, a cool private investigator, is hired by a wealthy California matron to locate her kidnapped husband.

48.name: Our Man Flint
48.description: When scientists use eco-terrorism to impose their will on the world by affecting extremes in the weather, Intelligence Chief Cramden calls in top agent Derek Flint.

49.name: Gambit
49.description: An English cat burglar needs a Eurasian dancer's help to pull off the perfect heist, but even the most foolproof schemes have a way of backfiring.

50.name: This Property Is Condemned
50.description: The dramatic love story of small-town Mississippi girl Alva Starr and railroad official Owen Legate, set during the Great Depression.
